title: 3 Ways of Approaching the Nash Bargaining Solution
snippet: In my senior year of college, I gave a seminar talk titled “3 Ways of Approaching the Nash Bargaining Solution.” Unfortunately, the talk was not recorded. Here, I’ll attempt to sketch the three proofs out again. I don’t have all of my old notes, so this might be a bit rough around the edges!Int...
